NYU Abu Dhabi Core Curriculum User Guide, 2019-2020
NYU Abu Dhabi Core Curriculum User Guide, 2019-2020

PDF for NYU Abu Dhabi's core curriculum. It includes the mission statement for NYUAD and a description of the NYUAD Core, which consists of two Core Colloquia, each of which addresses a significant global challenge from multidisciplinary perspectives, and four Core Competency Courses, one each in the four categories: Arts, Design, and Technology; Cultural Explorations and Analysis; Data and Discovery; and Structures of Thought and Society. It also describes other core classes, including the first year writing seminar, quantitative reasoning, experimental inquiry, and Islamic studies.
